text:
@realDonaldTrump False!!!! Misleading statement by @potus.
The Texas Supreme Court ruled that not having immunity to COVID19 is not considered a disability when it comes to requesting a mail-in ballot. But, they also ruled that the Bd of Elections can NOT question a voters claim of disability.
